channel.title: Server is changing level problem (srcds)
channel.description:
I am searching for an answer for half year. so I geuees i try this forums too...
I downloaded hl2mp with hldsupdatetool and I use cmd to host my own server, but what ever game I try this problem applies for any source game...
If i use changelevel command ,server is changing level, but the loading text "Server is changing level" freezes for clients and they have to hit cancel, and rejoin the server ! It dose change the map, but ingame you have to rejoin, why is it doing this ?!
I tried to join not only from my host PC i tried it from my laptop and people on server confirmed it too. No firewall, no antivirus. I deleted all the addons sourcemod, metamod , and just reinstalled my windows 7 32bit
